attributes.action: Allow European tourist-visa holders to visit the UK.
attributes.additional_details: We need to stimulate the UK economy. Many tourists are put off visiting the UK as a result of the separate visa requirement. There is no evidence that having our own visa protects us from terrorists or immigrants. As a compromise we could retain our own visa, but allow European (schengen) tourist visa holders to vist the UK for a limited period, say one week.
